meanings.definition: To fail to operate or function correctly.
meanings.sent1: The old car misfunctions often, causing delays in our plans.
meanings.sent2: When the computer misfunctions, it freezes and needs to be restarted.
meanings.sent3: The robot misfunctions at the worst times, making everyone laugh at its antics.
meanings.sent4: Her memory misfunctions like a faulty machine, skipping over important details.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock misfunctions so frequently that I can't rely on it anymore.

meanings.definition: A failure to operate or function correctly.
meanings.sent1: The misfunctions of the printer led to incomplete documents being printed.
meanings.sent2: We experienced a misfunction in the engine, causing the car to stop suddenly.
meanings.sent3: The misfunction of the door lock made it impossible to enter the room.
meanings.sent4: The misfunction of the microphone turned the concert into a silent event.
meanings.sent5: The misfunction of the traffic lights caused chaos at the intersection.
